column5: Our one acre property is surrounded by a privacy fence with an automated driveway gate that can accommodate large vehicles and trailers. The Annex is a separate house from the owners studio/residence that is furnished with all the necessary amenities for couples, solo adventurers, tourists and business travelers. We are close to Houston's cultural and sports centers and midway between Intercontinental airport and Downtown Houston. We're dog friendly and RV electrical connection available.
